column2: price_index <- combined %>% na.omit() %>% group_by(City) %>% summarise(avg_price = mean(price))

price_index %>% ggplot() + geom_col(aes(City,avg_price, fill = City)) + geom_point(aes(City, Cost_Index)) + theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=90)) + theme(legend.position="none") + geom_hline(yintercept = mean(price_index$Cost_Index,na.rm = TRUE),linetype="dashed")
